page.title: 11SUPERNATURAL LEGENDS
page.content: {THE TRAIN CRASH.}26 Dec.1962, on returning from a panto on a clear frosty night, lights were shining along the track.By the full moon we investigated.One train was piled on top of another.People hung from the windows.Blood was flying.Lots of fire and steam.When the bodies were taken out they dumped them in a shed.A week later lights were going off and on in the shed. I went to have a look. I had just shut the door in the shed and something put its hand on my shoulder. I turned round and realised I was face to face with a person that was dead! {PETTYWOOD COFFINS.}Two coffins were found in the orchard.They belonged to a witch and a pirate.There is a curse on any one who disturbs them.They kill cows, damage tractors and machinery, and throw bricks.If you dig them up it might happen to you.
